item.description:
1st Meetup Location - Dunkin' Donuts, 1550 West Main Road, Portsmouth RI at 0730

2nd Meetup Location - Dunkin' Donuts, 396 Washington Street, Middletown, CT 06457 at 0930

3rd Meetup Location - Dunkin Donuts, 15 Pine Street, Bristol, CT  06010

Some seriously fun roads out here by the looks of the map. Have been wanting to check out Western CT for some time now.

This ride has the potential to be one of the best of the season.  This is an all-day ride wtih some serious twisties, not recommended for the novice rider.

Google Map Link

Please RSVP with a note on which location you will be waiting. 

See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Kickstands up at 0730. Please arrive early and fuel up.
item.name: Western Uplands, CT - Forever Twisty
